allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial implementation of Hypothesis4D property-based testing library

This commit contains the complete MVP implementation of a property-based 
testing library for Delphi, inspired by Python''s Hypothesis library.

Features:
- Property-based testing with automatic value generation and shrinking
- Integer strategies: IntRange, IntPositive, IntNegative, IntNonZero
- String strategies: StringGen, StringAlpha, StringNumeric
- DUnitX integration via wrapper methods
- RTTI-based parameter inspection
- Comprehensive test suite with 14 passing tests

Core units:
- Hypothesis.Attributes.pas: Strategy attribute declarations
- Hypothesis.Generators.pas: Value generators with shrinking support
- Hypothesis.Core.pas: Test runner with failure shrinking
- Hypothesis.DUnitX.pas: DUnitX framework integration

Test suites:
- Hypothesis.Core.Tests.pas: Comprehensive framework tests
- Hypothesis.Examples.Tests.pas: Example usage demonstrations

Target: Delphi 11+ with Spring4D collections
Framework: DUnitX

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
